message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I really appreciate it, but $120 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $90 for this product.  What do you think?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you in the middle and sell the product for $105. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on your price, but $105 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $95. Let's see if we can find some common ground.
I understand that $105 is still a bit too high for you, Bob. I'm willing to come down further and sell the product for $102.50. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
